overview: Isn't it what we’ve long suspected? The members of boy-bands are all gay! At long last, a movie that reveals what happens when the music stops. Only the guy who blows the cocks of the boy-band best of all and who opens his ass for everyone will become the new band member. So once the concert’s over, the boys backstage concentrate on raw, hardcore fucking and deep-throat sucking! What's more, they like to invite their fans to join them - horny groupies who are all too ready and willing to open their asses for the band's raw, fat cocks! A real 100% bareback fuckfest!
title: Bare Boy Band
